attributes.review: I thought this app would help me give feedback but instead it just made racist and homophobic comments until I was forced to delete it. Maybe I’m using it wrong?
attributes.title: Confusing

attributes.review: I was absolutely horrified to open the app and see trumps nudes plastered over the entire home page! His pp looks like a Cheeto puff. My grandma saw it and fainted. We had to send her to the hospital last night. I am never downloading this app again😾
attributes.title: Cheeto Puff

attributes.review:
1.) I can’t go on the app without it crashing every 1-2 minutes.
2.) Very laggy!
3.) HORRIBLE layout. Very confusing to use.
4.) Doesnt really help me at all.
attributes.title: I used to be a trump fan, but this app is so horrible that I’ve changed my views

attributes.review: I download this app to see what trump has to offer and I kid you not all I saw was pornography of the Mr Donald Trump him self.👎🏻I am disgusted of what i saw. 👁❌I am a young girl who does not need to see the president’s tiny cheeto dust looking pp.😾 I am frustrated that this is our country’s president.
attributes.title: disgusting

attributes.review: i really wanted to support our racist, homophobic, and predatorial leader but it keeps glitching out 😔. i opened the app to see an expired block of cheddar cheese with a tuft of my cat's hair 🤮 who looks like it has a croissant's end for a reproductive organ🤪. i wanted to be a good citizen and support the right leader but it led me to sign up for emails from trump when i tapped on the screen🐠. fix app!!1!1! bad!!1!1!🕴🏽🧎<— this is just a lovely photo of shane proposing🥰!!!1!11
attributes.title: awful terrible no good very bad app✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: Horrible quality. I was immediately forced to see a picture of an angry Cheeto. I didn’t want to see that! My baby cousin’s sister’s friend’s brother’s dad’s parent also died immediately when shown the app!!! Very bad.
attributes.title: This app is a no

attributes.review: when i opened the app i saw bunches and bunches of photos of p0rnstars and p3nises EVERYWHERE!!!! then it kept asking me to send deer pics 😳. also i saw cheetos working out??? and i saw five feet sweating profusely 🤢 while interlocking their toes 🤢🤢🤢. it then asked me if i was a women and i said yes and iT KICKED ME OUT OF THE APP!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app glitches too much. It keeps saying some cheeto man will make American better but he hasn’t in the Pat 4 years. If anything he hasn’t completed any of the goals he promised us for his first election. Thank you have a good day
